item.title: St. Mike's Rally to Support Hospital Staff Dec 19, 2017
item.description: Like Scrooge, St. Michael’s Hospital is treating its employees badly. It’s got to stop. Join us for the rally: December 19, 2017: 4-5pm Join us at the corner of Queen Street and Bond Street. Lean more about the St. Mikes union drives at: http://cupehospitals.ca/stmikes
